title: Ungroup Array Elements Based on Function
description: In this lab, we will explore how to ungroup array elements based on a provided function. We will use the unzipWith() function, which takes an array produced by the zip() function and applies the provided function to ungroup the elements. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate arrays and perform custom operations on their elements.

meta.title: Array Ungrouping | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to ungroup array elements based on a provided function using the unzipWith() function. Explore array manipulation techniques and custom operations.
meta.keywords: array, ungrouping, unzipWith, programming, tutorials, JavaScript

steps.title: Ungroup Array Elements Based on Function

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 根据函数对数组元素进行解组
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何根据提供的函数对数组元素进行解组。我们将使用unzipWith()函数，该函数接受zip()函数生成的数组，并应用提供的函数来解组元素。完成本实验后，你将更好地理解如何操作数组并对其元素执行自定义操作。
